changeSet.author: cioan

preConditions.onFailMessage: The old or the new medication constructs concepts are not in the system

and.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept where uuid = '447aaa7a-cd03-11e5-9956-625662870761' or uuid = '3269F65B-1A28-42EE-8578-B9658387AA00'

not.sqlCheck: select count(*) from obs o1 join concept c1 on o1.concept_id=c1.concept_id and c1.uuid='65585192-977f-11e1-8993-905e29aff6c1' join obs o2 on o1.obs_group_id = o2.obs_id join concept c2 on o2.concept_id=c2.concept_id and c2.uuid='447aaa7a-cd03-11e5-9956-625662870761'

changeSet.comment: Migrate medications prescribed to a new construct that provides administration instructions.

changeSet.author: cioan

preConditions.onFailMessage: Failed to migrate HTN chronic care past medical history and complications obs

and.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept where uuid = '4CB5E127-C437-4514-8618-FDC27310148E'

not.sqlCheck: select count(*) from obs o inner join encounter e on o.encounter_id = e.encounter_id inner join encounter_type t on e.encounter_type = t.encounter_type_id and t.uuid='664b9442-977f-11e1-8993-905e29aff6c1' where o.concept_id = ( select concept_id from concept where uuid= '6db168f1-0f38-42d9-9f0e-90946a3d8e72' ) and o.obs_id in ( select ob.obs_group_id from obs ob where ob.concept_id=( select concept_id from concept where uuid= '65671c9a-977f-11e1-8993-905e29aff6c1' ) and ob.value_coded in ((select concept_id from concept where uuid= '65714e68-977f-11e1-8993-905e29aff6c1' ), (select concept_id from concept where uuid= '654b5c58-977f-11e1-8993-905e29aff6c1' ), (select concept_id from concept where uuid= '6577a218-977f-11e1-8993-905e29aff6c1' ), (select concept_id from concept where uuid= '113257AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA' ), (select concept_id from concept where uuid= '115268AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA' ), (select concept_id from concept where uuid= '656f1eea-977f-11e1-8993-905e29aff6c1'), (select concept_id from concept where uuid= '126580AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA' )))

changeSet.comment: Migrate HTN medical history and complications obs, only if the new concept(medical history and complications construct) has been added to the system.

changeSet.author: cioan

preConditions.onFailMessage: The new seizure concepts, Seizure occurred since last visit and Any seizure triggers present have not been added to the system yet

and.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept where uuid = '655033A8-AD14-409A-A79F-4D5AA2A03900' or uuid = 'DA1FC8AF-FC15-4AC0-B980-EB8B0FFC95CD'

not.sqlCheck: select count(*) from obs o, concept c where o.concept_id=c.concept_id and c.uuid= '5f520642-cf63-11e5-ab30-625662870761'

changeSet.comment: Migrate Epilepsy seizure activities obs, only if the new concepts have been added to the system.

changeSet.author: cioan
changeSet.comment: Migrate HIV test results from Reactive/Non-Reactive to Positive/Negative concepts.
changeSet.sql: update obs set value_coded = 703 where concept_id = 2169 and value_coded =1228 and voided = 0; update obs set value_coded = 664 where concept_id = 2169 and value_coded =1229 and voided = 0;

changeSet.author: jmbabazi
changeSet.comment: IS-392, Create concept mapping View at startup
changeSet.sql: create view report_mapping as select crm.concept_id, crs.name "source", crt.code from concept_reference_map crm, concept_reference_term crt, concept_reference_source crs where crm.concept_reference_term_id = crt.concept_reference_term_id and crt.concept_source_id = crs.concept_source_id and crt.retired = 0 and crs.retired = 0 and crs.name in ('PIH','CIEL','PIH Malawi');
